description.en: Place four cups on your challenge field as depicted. The goal is to move the cups from their starting point to the middle of the field and stack them.

The cups have to be placed one by one in the middle.
Your robot has to stay within the challenge field.
Your robot should not knock down any of the cups.

You stepped out of the field and kicked more than two cups = Great!
You only kicked two cups and stayed within the field = Excellent job!
No cups kicked and you stayed within the field = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
You stepped out the field and knocked down more than two cups = 5 points

You haven't stepped out of the field and knocked down only two cups = 10 points

You neither stepped out, nor knocked down any of the cups = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
